ValidationRule.description: All text input fields Req'd for Closed Won
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
$Setup.Master_Validation__c.Policy_Active__c && NOT(OR($RecordType.Name = "Scale",$RecordType.Name = "Health & Benefits", $RecordType.Name = "FS Direct")) &&
AND( ISBLANK( State_Fees_Other__c ), ISCHANGED( Stage__c ), ISPICKVAL( Stage__c , "Policy Delivered / Closed Won") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Field Required: Pricing Detail- State Fees (Other)
